samples.name: Quartz-Feldspar Aggregate
samples.description: This sample shows a typical quartz-feldspar aggregate commonly found in granitic rocks. The BSE image reveals compositional contrast between the lighter feldspar grains and darker quartz crystals, while the EDS mapping provides detailed elemental distribution showing silicon, aluminum, and potassium variations across the mineral phases.
samples.reference: Johnson, A. et al. (2023). Automated mineral characterization of granitic aggregates using combined BSE-EDS analysis. Journal of Mineralogical Sciences, 45(3), 123-138.

samples.name: Garnet Porphyroblast
samples.description: Large garnet porphyroblast showing characteristic chemical zoning patterns and inclusion trails. The BSE imaging reveals internal textures and different stages of metamorphic growth, providing insights into pressure-temperature evolution during metamorphism.
samples.reference: Anderson, M. & Clark, R. (2023). Garnet porphyroblast growth mechanisms in high-grade metamorphic rocks. Petrology Today, 51(6), 234-251.
